ADLXDesktop(IADLXDesktopServices*, IADLXDesktop*, IADLXDisplayServices*)

Creates a managed desktop facade from native desktop and services (optionally with display services for ownership queries).

public ADLXDesktop(IADLXDesktopServices* pDesktopServices, IADLXDesktop* pDesktop, IADLXDisplayServices* pDisplayServices = null)

Parameters

pDesktopServices IADLXDesktopServices*

Native desktop services pointer.

pDesktop IADLXDesktop*

Native desktop pointer.

pDisplayServices IADLXDisplayServices*

Optional display services pointer used for display queries.

AddDesktopListEventListener(OnDesktopListChanged)

Subscribe to desktop list change events. Returns a handle the caller can dispose (or pass to remove) to unsubscribe.

public DesktopListListenerHandle AddDesktopListEventListener(DesktopListListenerHandle.OnDesktopListChanged callback)
